title: Modła, Głogów County
data: Modła [ˈmɔdwa] is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Jerzmanowa, within Głogów County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland.[1] It lies approximately 4 km (2 mi) north of Jerzmanowa, 5 km (3 mi) south-west of Głogów, and 90 km (56 mi) north-west of the regional capital Wrocław. This Głogów County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
